title: 2018 Engineering Alumni Award Honorees | Engineering Alumni | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents:

Engineering Alumni     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Engineering Alumni      Engineering Alumni   Main Menu    News           Dean's List    RISE Magazine         Events           Upcoming Events         Get Involved           Join us on LinkedIn    Become a Mentor    Volunteer    Engineer your own involvement    Honor a Professor         Awards           2019 Alumni Award Honorees    2018 Alumni Award Honorees    2017 Alumni Award Honorees         Give    Contact     Eyebrow menu    College of Engineering    Engineering Career Center    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Engineering Alumni    Awards    2018 Engineering Alumni Award Honorees        2018 Engineering Alumni Award Honorees  The Engineering Alumni Awards recognize and celebrate the accomplishments of UIC College of Engineering alumni. They are given by the college and the Engineering Alumni Association.  Our winners, recognized at a ceremony each fall, are engineering and computer science graduates who have used their UIC education to establish rewarding, productive, and high-impact careers.  Congratulations to our 2018 honorees:       2018 UIC College of Engineering Alumni Award Winners      Laurie
